item.title: Report X-2023061563
item.description:
Report X-2023061563

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damaged fully regulated package was found in loading work area DescribePack: Upon inspection the container of fresh n clear oxidizing shock had a loose closure which had caused an internal leakage inside of the box DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The damaged fully regulated package was placed inside of a hazmat plastic bag

item.title: Report X-2023061260
item.description:
Report X-2023061260

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-17
  • City: HOT SPRINGS NATIONAL PARK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: 5 gallon bucket found to be leaking from crack on bottom of bucket. Bucket placed in Hazmat Barrel and sent to QA. DescribePack: Small crack in bottom of bucket. Unsure of cause. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Spill clean up. Alpho-mag was applied to absorb the chemicals in affected area. Affected packaging was placed in well ventilated area.
